= Manual Installation =

== Prerequisites ==

To build la rime, you need these tools and libraries:
  * cmake
  * subversion
  * boost
  * gtest (optional)
  * ibus
  * kyotocabinet
  * opencc
  * yaml-cpp

== Build and install ibus-rime ==

Don't know if it will work for you...
{{{
mkdir rimeime
cd rimeime
svn checkout http://rimeime.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/brise
svn checkout http://rimeime.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ibus-rime
svn checkout http://rimeime.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/librime
cd ibus-rime
# this script uses 'sudo' to install ibus-rime; do this as YOU
./install.sh
}}}

== Configure IBus ==

Add "Rime" to the input method list in IBus Preferences, and... Voilà !

= ibus-rime on Ubuntu 12.04 安裝手記 =

今天天氣不錯，我更新了一把Ubuntu，記錄下安裝 ibus-rime 的步驟。

以下新安裝的程序庫都是靜態鏈接上去的，所以只是編譯時依賴而非運行時依賴。

{{{
sudo apt-get install build-essential cmake subversion
sudo apt-get install libboost-all-dev libopencc-dev libz-dev libibus-1.0-dev

mkdir ~/rimeime
cd ~/rimeime

wget http://fallabs.com/kyotocabinet/pkg/kyotocabinet-1.2.74.tar.gz
tar xzvf kyotocabinet-1.2.74.tar.gz
cd kyotocabinet-1.2.74
./configure
make
sudo make install
cd ..

wget http://yaml-cpp.googlecode.com/files/yaml-cpp-0.3.0.tar.gz
tar xzvf yaml-cpp-0.3.0.tar.gz
cd yaml-cpp
mkdir build
cd build
cmake ..
make
sudo make install
cd ../..

svn checkout http://rimeime.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/brise
svn checkout http://rimeime.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ibus-rime
svn checkout http://rimeime.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/librime
cd ibus-rime
./install.sh
}}}
